medical_history.chief_complaint: In-stent restenosis requiring elective percutaneous coronary intervention.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms of restenosis led to the decision for intervention, with no specific details on the onset or progression of symptoms provided.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous myocardial infarction in 7 patients (46.6%), previous coronary artery bypass grafting in 5 patients (30%), diabetes in 5 patients (30%), hypercholesterolemia in 14 patients (93.3%), and hypertension in 11 patients (73.3%).
medical_history.family_history: Family history of coronary artery disease in 5 patients (30%).
